attributes.action: Revise the IEP project design regarding lack of bicycle spaces
attributes.additional_details: The new Intercity Express Project train sets for the Great Western Main Line (due 2018) have been designed with only 4 bicycles spaces. With the 'go green' policies the DfT are implementing this is not acceptable to reduce the number of spaces (currently 6 on High Speed Trains) given the number of cyclists commuting will only increase beyond the 6 currently provided, which often isn't enough anyway.
